body:
HDF5 1.12 broke backward compatibility, so we're preferring version 1.10 for now.  Packages that need the new API should specify:

    depends_on("hdf5@1.12:")

to be explicit. We can eventually change the preference, but at the moment most libraries have not udpated to use the new HDF5.
title: hdf5: prefer version 1.10 for now
